110c94270682cef72f4af5667ac8d46524730987.query:
INSERT INTO kavasam_report_tags (report_id, tag_id) 
             VALUES (
                (
                SELECT 
                    ID 
                FROM 
                    kavasam_reports
                WHERE hash_id = 
                       (SELECT ID from kavasam_hashes WHERE id_type = $1 AND hash = $2)
                AND reported_by = 
                    (SELECT ID from kavasam_users WHERE public_key = $3)
                ),
               (SELECT ID from kavasam_tags WHERE name = $4)
              )
             ON CONFLICT(report_id, tag_id) DO NOTHING;

3496243fbf368f40c85c921630e5249bd04d58a2.query:
SELECT 
                kavasam_tags.name
            FROM
                kavasam_tags
            INNER JOIN
                kavasam_report_tags
            ON
                kavasam_report_tags.tag_id = kavasam_tags.ID
            WHERE
                kavasam_report_tags.report_id = $1

c9fdcb9d1f4c60c4a0d0129b136893ea1fd904e2.query:
SELECT kavasam_hashes.hash, kavasam_reports.ID
                FROM kavasam_hashes
                INNER JOIN
                    kavasam_reports
                ON
                    kavasam_hashes.ID = kavasam_reports.hash_id
                INNER JOIN 
                    kavasam_users
                ON
                    kavasam_users.ID = kavasam_reports.reported_by
                WHERE
                    kavasam_users.public_key = $1
                AND
                    kavasam_hashes.id_type = $2

d5b4110e8d12a71325775813d586da08302870ab.query:
INSERT INTO kavasam_users (public_key) 
        VALUES ($1) 
        ON CONFLICT(public_key) 
            DO NOTHING

f0363940f1b25052e3c681db3700b4a1b3394099.query:
SELECT kavasam_hashes.hash, kavasam_hashes.id_type, kavasam_reports.ID
                FROM kavasam_hashes
                INNER JOIN
                    kavasam_reports
                ON
                    kavasam_hashes.ID = kavasam_reports.hash_id
                INNER JOIN 
                    kavasam_users
                ON
                    kavasam_users.ID = kavasam_reports.reported_by
                WHERE
                    kavasam_users.public_key = $1
